channel.title: The Spoken Orgasm's podcast
channel.description: Greetings to all the lovely people out there that are here to experience the SPOKEN O... LUVBUG and SUGA MAMA are here to rock ya box and pull that SUPA LUVA side up out cha! :-) This show is here to help inspire you to love and be loved...to create thoughts and feelings that cause or lead to the pure pleasure that we all seek... We specialize in diggin in them crates and pulling out mad flava...mixing classic tunes with with a tasty listening set of music, poetry/spoken word, and original music.

item.title: SUG's leo constellation: return to the blackhole
item.description:
Hey hey now lovers...welcome back to ...the spoken o show...here in our debut full show back we relect on the good times...this show has been a blessing to us to put together as well as a blessed kiss for your ears...now...he are paying omage to our funk forfathers by featuring some sexy and classic jams picked by yours truly...we are DJs at heart and we tribute and honor all the artists that grace our show... open your mind, close your eyes...see how many you can recognize...as we play what we say which is pure funk music from it's hayday :-) I am a young funkateer and I know it... SUG been taught by one of the best...she did a lot of work on this show...make sure to tell us what you think :-) **SUG thanks URB with a big ol' kiss (and not cyber! LOL)** hope you guys enjoy...... Enjoy the show lovers, because its just for you....muah! LONG LIVE DA FUNK!!!! SPOKEN O BABY!!!! URB n SUG

oh.....ps
added extra pre show mix.......

My Podcast Alley feed! {pca-210b6e98203a7951b4976f57916013ea}

item.title: HOT N TASTY - PASSION PASTERIES
item.description: Greetings dear lovers… We here at the spoken O show would like to serve you a special treat… A honey-covered tasty morsel that issssss this show will be a tantalizing touch on your listening taste buds. Stay tuned while we put on a show with a generous spread of delightful delicacies from artists such as the valentine brothers, Maze, the whispers, Stephanie mills, and so much more… you can think of the SPOKEN O SHOW as comfort food baby…good till the last morsel. :-) We would like to thank all the artists that graced our show with examples of their tremendous talents to put us in a different frame of mind…a big and special thank you goes out to DJ LUVBUG for putting his whole ENTIRE FOOT in this show and making it as good as it is...as always baby...we all know you the best babes…ain‘t nuthin’ new…(LOL) If you would like to contact us about the show or about how you can be involved with the show, please email us at spokenoshow@yahoo.com or hit us up on our myspace at www.myspace.com/spokenoshow. Lovers, get ya suga spoon ready to dip…cuz’ this show is is truly good enough to eat…

item.title: 80 's ELECTRONIC SEDUCTION in 3.D
item.description: Hey lovers…we appreciate you joining us here on the spoken o show…where you can release all tensions and follow our direction…as we lead you …the spoken O… On this edition, we will be takin’ a def trip into the 80s baby!!! We will be spinnin’ some FLY ASS JAMZ by a few of the artists from the SUPER colorful, always exciting electric era we call the 1980’s…artists such as SOS BAND, MIDNIGHT STAR, CAMEO, APOLLONIA AND VANITY 6, KEITH SWEAT, BILLY IDOL, UNCLE JAMMS ARMY and much more… DJ LUVBUG and Suga Mama are ready to take you back to those days when love was erotic, electric and flavorful. So get ready…cuz…he we cum.

item.title: THE SPOKEN ORGASM SHOW (EVER SO COSMIC)
item.description: Looking for some good ol’ (fresh N funky on the ears) music to love 2? This episode of the Spoken O Show was made to FUNK yo’ mind up with some super FLY funk jamz. We intend to turn every listener onto some good ol’ funky lovin’ by the end of this show. We servin’ up a lil bit of WILD SUGAR, XAVIER, CHOCOLATE MILK, FUNKADELIC, BOOTSY COLLINS, and a few others. We also have a guest spoken word artist by the name of HAITI BLUEZ joining us on the show. If you would like to get more FLY pieces by Haiti, you can contact him at www.myspace.com/haitibluezfood. We would definitely like to express our love and thanks to each and every listener, down loader, admirer, hater..lol of our show cuz we appreciate all the messages, friend adds, folks spreading the word about our show, people being a part of the show by sharing your art form with everyone…we only hope that the relationship we have will continue to grow….us producing…you enjoying….and oneness Peace and love ya’ll! DJ LUVBUG and SUGA MAMA

item.title: THE SPOKEN ORGASM SHOW 2 (DO ME RIGHT)
item.description: Here’s another one for all you lovers out there. DJ LUVBUG and Suga Mama chose to take things a bit further on the erotic side with smooth sexy music and HOTT FIYAH spoken word...sure to get your mental juices flowin’ We mixed a smooth concoction of ol’ skool jamz including artists like Walter Jackson, Marvin Gaye, Kleer, The Smith Connection, Donald Byrd, Chaka Khan, Rick James, and a few others. We also got some super sexy poetry by Suga Mama and Mz. Denyce. For more poetry from Mz. Denyce, you can visit www.myspace.com/d_qt or http://www.theblackpoetrycafeonline.com/ We thank each and every last one of you for tuning into the SPOKEN ORGASM SHOW and for downloading this FLYness  Here’s a shout out to a few of the places that show us love: Pennsylvania (Philly in the HOUSE! LOL) New Jersey Boston, Massachusetts D-Troit, Michigan Knoxville, TN Niagra Falls Area Miami, FL Louisiana Oklahoma city Kansas Denver, CO And last but not least of the US love is dedicated to my people in Cali - Los Angeles and surrounding areas…mad mad love to ya’ll! If it wasn’t for one particular, super special, man in LA, this show wouldn’t be happnin’ right now….don’t worry baby, you will make it home soon….love you… Outside the US: Botswana, Africa Roma, Italy France UK Belgium Czech Republic Germany Madrid, Spain Beijing, China Tokyo, Japan Sydney, Australia Moscow, Russia

hey yall this is our first show LOL really are second show

our Pilot show ran, first to see if we got any type of responds, well we did in a negitive and positive way Which lol in it's self is balance, anyway this show is dedicated to Love hope you enjoy the smOove Butta Sounds. peace! :) Thank you Suga Mama and DJ.LUVBUG the Spoken Orgasm Show
